Steven Leslie Berks (born 3 August 1937), known professionally as Steven Berkoff, is an English character actor, author, playwright and theatre director.
As an actor, he is best known for his performances in villainous roles, such as Lt. Col Podovsky in ', General Orlov in the James Bond movie "Octopussy, "Victor Maitland in "Beverly Hills Cop" and Adolf Hitler in the TV mini-series "War and Remembrance". He also played Det. Const. Tom in the 1971 movie "A Clockwork Orange".
